message: One of my favorite features of the Gmail webapp: unread message count appears in the favicon. Super-handy as a pinned tab in Chrome.
@spencer I tried that labs feature... I didn't like the "0" though
maybe we could do it with the count but no "0"
That's more what I was thinking
Maybe the count is redundant, and a 'new' indicator is all that's needed.
Oh this would be sweet if it worked in groups and topics in different tabs. I'd dedicate a whole browser window to convore if that were the case
ohhh, I didn't even notice the indicator until now. Weird.
so there is an indicator, but no count
haha yeah, we've had that for a while now
the count is kind of cool, but really distracting
